property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Title Of Related List
property.description: Enter the Label of Related List [eg--> Opportunities]

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name SLDS
property.description: Enter the iconName of Related List Header [eg--> standard:record]

property.name: objectAPIName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Enter the object API name [eg--> Opportunity]

property.name: childRelationshipName
property.label: Child Relationship Name
property.description: Enter the child relationship name [eg--> Opportunities]

property.name: relationshipFieldAPIName
property.label: Relationship Field API Name
property.description: Enter the API Name of relationship field [eg--> AccountId]

property.name: fieldConfigDetails
property.label: Fields Config Details
property.description: Enter the details of all the fields in given format [eg--> TO BE UPDATED]
